00082     int i, j, k;

00085     k = (N>key_length ? N : key_length);
00086     for (; k; k--) {
00087         mt[i] = (mt[i] ^ ((mt[i-1] ^ (mt[i-1] >> 30)) * 1664525UL))
00088           + init_key[j] + j; /* non linear */
00089         mt[i] &= 0xffffffffUL; /* for WORDSIZE > 32 machines */

00091         if (i>=N) { mt[0] = mt[N-1]; i=1; }
00092         if (j>=key_length) j=0;

00097         mt[i] &= 0xffffffffUL; /* for WORDSIZE > 32 machines */
